bibl.bibl: Owen, Richard. 1849a. On Dinornis (Part III): containing a description of the skull and beak of that genus, and of the same characteristic parts of Palapteryx, and of two other genera of birds, Notornis and Nestor; forming part of an extensive series of ornithic remains discovered by Mr Walter Mantell at Waingongoro, North Island of New Zealand.
